summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 32, Denny-Fuhrman's Addition, being the alley between Allison Street and Millard Street, from Harvard Avenue North to Fuhrman Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 89699, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
